headline: Kroger’s New CEO Brings Walmart Experience To Cost Focus And Margins
summary: Kroger appointed former Walmart executive Greg Foran as its new CEO as part of a cost-cutting and restructuring plan. The leadership change follows the prior CEO’s exit over an ethics violation. The company is pursuing operational streamlining and a refocus of the business at a time of industry pressure. Kroger, listed as NYSE:KR, enters this leadership transition with shares at $69.76. The stock shows longer term resilience, with a 72.8% return over 3 years and 138.3% over 5 years, while...

headline: Saputo USA Recalls Great Value Cottage Cheese Because of Possible Health Risk
summary: MILWAUKEE, Feb. 24, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Saputo Cheese USA Inc. (SUSA or Saputo) is voluntarily recalling select cottage cheese products produced by SUSA due to the possibility of liquid dairy ingredients used in the items not being fully pasteurized according to state regulatory standards. While no illnesses or hospitalizations associated with the recalled products have been reported to date, consuming products that are not fully pasteurized can pose a significant health risk, especially to
